watering: Water every 2-3 weeks. Allow soil to dry completely between watering.
sunlight: Thrives in indirect sunlight. Can tolerate low light.
fertilizing: Fertilize once a month during growing season with a balanced houseplant fertilizer.

watering: Keep soil consistently moist, but avoid waterlogging.
sunlight: Prefers bright, indirect sunlight. Avoid direct sun.
fertilizing: Feed every 6-8 weeks with a water-soluble houseplant fertilizer.

watering: Water once a week. Let the top inch of soil dry out between watering.
sunlight: Thrives in bright, indirect light but can tolerate moderate light.
fertilizing: Fertilize every 4-6 weeks in spring and summer with liquid fertilizer.

watering: Water deeply but infrequently. Let soil dry completely before next watering.
sunlight: Needs bright, indirect sunlight. Can tolerate some direct sun.
fertilizing: Feed with a succulent fertilizer 2-3 times during the growing season.

watering: Water when the top 2 inches of soil are dry. Avoid overwatering.
fertilizing: Fertilize once a month during spring and summer with a balanced fertilizer.
